### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE research_trends (
  research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  research_topic TEXT,
  research_keywords TEXT[]
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE research_trends SET research_topic = 'Machine Learning' WHERE research_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE research_trends (
  research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  research_topic TEXT,
  research_keywords TEXT[]
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE research_trends SET research_keywords = ARRAY['AI', 'Data Science', 'Neural Networks'] WHERE research_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
